amendment.description: To amend title 31, United States Code, to provide Federal Government employees with bid protest rights in actions under Office of Management and Budget Circular A-76, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3224 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3224 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Collins. (consideration: CR S6717; text: CR S6717) To amend title 31, United States Code, to provide Federal Government employees with bid protest rights in actions under Office of Management and Budget Circular A-76, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3224 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3224 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Collins.
